title: Hasti Nafisi AI & ML Scientist
text: An accomplished AI & ML Scientist brings a robust foundation in applied mathematics and computer science, complemented by a proven track record of designing and deploying scalable, production-ready applications leveraging Python frameworks and Generative AI (GenAI). This expertise extends to the development and implementation of enterprise-level AI solutions, encompassing Large Language Model (LLM) applications, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) patterns, and agentic workflows, with demonstrated proficiency in fine-tuning LLMs and optimizing RAG patterns to enhance Natural Language Processing (NLP) performance. The skill set is further enriched by adept utilization of API frameworks such as FastAPI, alongside proficiency in Azure, AWS, Docker, and Git, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of advanced technological solutions.

title: Hasti Nafisi AI & ML Scientist
text: An accomplished AI & ML Scientist brings a robust foundation in applied mathematics and computer science, complemented by a proven track record of designing and deploying scalable, production-ready applications leveraging Python frameworks and Generative AI (GenAI). This expertise extends to the development and implementation of enterprise-level AI solutions, encompassing Large Language Model (LLM) applications, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) patterns, and agentic workflows, with demonstrated proficiency in fine-tuning LLMs and optimizing RAG patterns to enhance Natural Language Processing (NLP) performance. The skill set is further enriched by adept utilization of API frameworks such as FastAPI, alongside proficiency in Azure, AWS, Docker, and Git, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of advanced technological solutions.

title: Hasti Nafisi AI & ML Scientist
text:
Experience

AI & ML Scientist
Remote, Canada | MUUTAA
Feb 2025 - Present

Developed enterprise-grade Python applications integrating LangChain and Landgraph frameworks to power multi-agent systems for the multisource chatbot Tavily.

Implemented database solutions with DataGrid and unstructured data to create efficient data architectures, optimizing LLM performance and query responses, resulting in a 5% improvement in time consumption.

Developed specialized LLM-to-database interfaces enabling AI systems to intelligently query, retrieve, and manipulate structured and unstructured data (Vector DBs) in real-time.

AI & ML Engineer
Montreal, Canada | Nexadeeds
Mar 2024 - Dec 2024

Developed and fine-tuned machine learning models integrating LLMs (e.g., GPT, Gemini, Llama, Groq) to enhance NLP capabilities.

Built robust enterprise API integrations implementing RAG algorithms with FastAPI and Azure cloud AI services for production environments.

Engineered scalable data pipelines in Python (using Pandas, scikit-learn, and SQL) to optimize data ingestion, reducing manual processing time by 8%.

Designed interactive dashboards (Power BI, Tableau) to monitor operational metrics and support decision-making.

AI Researcher
Montreal, Canada | Mila (Quebec AI Institute)
Sep 2022 - Dec 2023

Developed a Bayesian statistical model with a novel prior using MCMC algorithms, enhancing galaxy image reconstruction performance by 12%.

Applied deep learning and statistical ML models (using JAX) to analyze astronomy images for accurate identification of celestial objects.

Collaborated with interdisciplinary teams on gravitational lensing analysis and galaxy reconstruction techniques.

Data Scientist
Tehran, Iran | Coin Plus
2017 - 2020

Designed and implemented ML models, including LSTM-based forecasting, to analyze and forecast stock market price trends, improving prediction accuracy by 5%.

Collected, cleaned, and organized time series data to develop detailed forecasts for revenue and profitability.

Produced and analyzed financial reports to support strategic planning.

title: Hasti Nafisi AI & ML Scientist
text:
Education

M.Sc. Applied Mathematics & Computer Science (3.9/4.3)
Montreal, Canada | Montreal University and Mila
2021 - 2024

Dissertation: Horseshoe Regularization for Fully Wavelet-based Lensing Inversion

M.Sc. Financial Mathematics (19/20)
Tehran, Iran | Science and Culture University
2013 - 2015

Dissertation: Developing Jump Diffusion Models for Stock Market Trends Using Sentiment Analysis

B.Sc. Applied Mathematics
Tehran, Iran | Alzahra University
2009 - 2013

title: Hasti Nafisi AI & ML Scientist
text:
Skills

Programming Languages: Python, SAS, MATLAB, R, SQL

Data Science & ML: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Spark, TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, Keras, XGBoost, Hugging Face, Matplotlib, Photoshop, Seaborn, Power BI, Tableau

DevOps & Version Control: Git Version Control, CI/CD, Agile methodologies, PyCharm, spaCy, DataGrip, PostgreSQL, Postman, Azure, AWS, Hugging Face

Research Methodologies: Experimental Design, Peer Review, Interdisciplinary Collaboration
Specialized Areas: Deep Learning, NLP, Transformers, API Development, Computer Vision, LLMs, GenAI, RAG
